  • Field Details

    • value

      private java.lang.String value
      The String value of the card:

      A for an Ace; 2 to 10 for the cards with that value; J, Q and K to Jack, Queen and King, respectively.

    • suit

      private char suit
      The suit of the card:

      D: Diamonds; C: Clubs; S: Spades; H: Hearts.

    • intValue

      private int intValue
      Numeric value of a card:

    • isUp

      private boolean isUp
      Visibility of a card: true if the card is visible, false otherwise

    • isSoft

      private boolean isSoft
      If an Ace counts as a 11 (true) or a 1 (false)

      public boolean getIsUp()

    • isSoft

      public boolean isSoft()
      Gets the variable isSoft, which determines the value of the Ace.
      Returns:
      isSoft true if the Ace is worth 11, false if it's worth 1.
